shortdesc.ph: This page introduces the deprecated and deleted APIs in the SDK.

section.title: Deprecated APIs
section.p: The deprecated APIs are expected to be officially deleted in approximately one year. Agora recommends that you promptly replace them with the recommended APIs to avoid any impact on your online services.

section.title: Deleted APIs
section.p: The APIs have been deleted from the SDK. Use the recommended alternative APIs to implement the related functionality.

row.entry: Sets the fallback option for the published video stream based on the network conditions.
Occurs when the published media stream falls back to an audio-only stream.
Occurs when the downlink network information changes.
The frame rate (Kbps) received since the last count.
报告 Wi-Fi 加速效果。
Sets the video display mode of a specified remote user.
Opens the custom media resource file.
Sets the preferences for high-quality video. (LIVE_BROADCASTING only).
Enables built-in encryption with an encryption password before users join a channel.
The event callback of the extension.
Occurs when the extension is enabled.
Occurs when the extension is disabled.
Occurs when the extension runs incorrectly.
